Items.Title: Application no. 20115006 TCK, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Mussels & More, Ltd.  to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 510 80th Street, Borough of Brooklyn , Council District no.43.
